methods.name: deleteAllProperties()
methods.description: Deletes all properties in the currentPropertiesstore.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key for the property to delete

methods.name: deleteProperty(key)
methods.description: Deletes the property with the given key in the currentPropertiesstore.

methods.name: getKeys()
methods.description: Gets all keys in the currentPropertiesstore.

methods.name: getProperties()
methods.description:
Gets a copy of all key-value pairs in the currentPropertiesstore. Note that the
returned object is not a live view of the store. Consequently, changing the properties on the
returned object will not automatically update them in storage, or vice versa.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key for the property value to retrieve

methods.name: getProperty(key)
methods.description: Gets the value associated with the given key in the currentPropertiesstore, ornullif no such key exists.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: an object containing key-values pairs to set

methods.name: setProperties(properties)
methods.description: Sets all key-value pairs from the given object in the currentPropertiesstore.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: an object containing key-values pairs to set

parameters.name: deleteAllOthers
parameters.description:
trueto delete all other key-value pairs in the properties
    object;falseto not

methods.name: setProperties(properties, deleteAllOthers)
methods.description:
Sets all key-value pairs from the given object in the currentPropertiesstore,
optionally deleting all other properties in the store.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key for the property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: the value to associate with the key

methods.name: setProperty(key, value)
methods.description: Sets the given key-value pair in the currentPropertiesstore.

methods.name: getDocumentProperties()
methods.description:
Gets a property store (for this script only) that all users can access within the open
document, spreadsheet, or form. It is only available if the script is published and executing
as an add-on or if it isboundto a Google file
type. When document properties are not available this method returnsnull. Document
properties created by a script are not accessible outside that script, even by other scripts
accessing the same document.

methods.name: getScriptProperties()
methods.description: Gets a property store that all users can access, but only within this script.

methods.name: getUserProperties()
methods.description: Gets a property store that only the current user can access, and only within this script.
